title: Cunning Action
contents: text | You can take a bonus action on each of your turns in combat. This action can be used only to take the Dash, Disengage, or Hide action, or to control your Mage Hand.
text | You may use your Mage Hand to perform Sleight of Hand checks opposed by the target's Perception.

title: Disguise Self
contents: text | You make yourself—including your clothing, armor, weapons, and other belongings on your person—look different until the spell ends or until you use your action to dismiss it. You can seem 1 foot shorter or taller and can appear thin, fat, or in between.
text | To discern that you are disguised, a creature can use its action to inspect your appearance and must succeed on an Investigation check against your spell save DC.

title: Invisibility
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (an eyelash encased in gum arabic)
property | Duration | Concentration, up to 1 hour

text | A creature you touch becomes invisible until the spell ends. Anything the target is wearing or carrying is invisible as long as it is on the target's person. The spell ends for a target that attacks or casts a spell.
text | When you cast this spell using a spell slot of 3rd level or higher, you can target one additional creature for each slot level above 2nd.

title: Mending
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (two lodestones)

text | This spell repairs a single break or tear in an object you touch, such as broken chain link, two halves of a broken key, a torn cloak, or a leaking wineskin. As long as the break or tear is no larger than 1 foot in any dimension, you mend it, leaving no trace of the former damage.
text | This spell can physically repair a magic item or construct, but the spell can't restore magic to such an object.

title: Minor Illusion
contents: property | Components | S, M (a bit of fleece)
text | Sound must be determined when cast, can be up to one minute. Volume from whisper to scream.
text | Image of an object within 5' cube. Illusory object does not emit sensory effects. Does not hold up to physical inspection or an Investigation check against your spell save DC.
text | Further casts dispel previous effects.

title: Prestidigitation
contents: bullet | Instantaneously: sensory effect, light/snuff out a small flame, clean/soil, chill, warm, or flavor an object no larger than 1 cubic foot.
bullet | You make a color, a small mark, or a symbol appear on an object or a surface for 1 hour.
bullet | You create a nonmagical trinket or image that can fit in your hand and that lasts until the end of your next turn.

title: Soul Knife
contents: text| When you take the Attack action or make an opportunity attack, you manifest psionic energy to augment your strike. These count as weapon attacks.

title: Ki Burners
contents: text | Immediately after you take the Attack action on your turn, you can spend 1 ki point to make two unarmed strikes as a Bonus Action.
text | You can spend 1 ki point to take the Dodge action as a bonus action on your turn.
text | You can spend 1 ki point to take the Disengage or Dash action as a bonus action on your turn, and your jump distance is doubled for the turn.

title: Deflect Missiles
contents: text | When hit by a ranged attack, use your reaction to reduce the damage by 1d10 + your Dexterity modifier + your monk level.

text | If you reduce the damage to 0, you can catch the missile if it is small enough for you to hold in one hand and you have at least one hand free. If you catch a missile in this way, you can spend 1 ki point to make a ranged attack (range 20/60 feet) with the weapon or piece of ammunition you just caught, as part of the same reaction. You make this attack with proficiency, regardless of your weapon proficiencies, and the missile counts as a monk weapon for the attack.

title: Psychic Whispers
contents: text | Choose one or more creatures up to a number equal to your proficiency bonus plus your Wisdom modifier, and then roll one Martial die.

text | For a number of hours equal to the number rolled, all chosen creatures may communicate telepathically. Sending or receiving a message requires no action and you must be within 1 mile of the target.
text | This power can be used once after a long rest with all further uses consuming 1 ki point.

title: Bat
contents: property | Senses | blindsight 60 ft., passive Perception 11
description | Echolocation | The bat can't use its blindsight while deafened.
description | Keen Hearing | Advantage on Wisdom ( Perception) checks that rely on hearing.
description | Bite | Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 1 piercing damage.

title: Crab
contents: property | Senses | blindsight 30 ft., passive Perception 9
description | Amphibious | Can breathe air and water.
description | Claw | Melee Weapon Attack: +0 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 1 bludgeoning damage.

title: Octopus
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 30 ft., passive Perception 12
description | Hold Breath | Out of water, the octopus can hold its breath for 30 minutes.
description | Underwater Camouflage | Advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) underwater.

description | Ink Cloud (Recharges after a Short or Long Rest) | Expel a 5-foot-radius cloud of ink, if underwater. Area is heavily obscured for 1 minute, a significant current can disperse the ink. After releasing the ink, the octopus can use the Dash action as a bonus action.

title: Owl
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 120 ft., passive Perception 13
description | Flyby | The owl doesn't provoke opportunity attacks when it flies out of an enemy's reach.
description | Keen Hearing and Sight | The owl has advantage on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on hearing or sight.

title: Spider
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 30 ft., passive Perception 10
description | Spider Climb | The spider can climb difficult surfaces at will.
description | Web Sense | While in contact with a web, the spider knows the exact location of any other creature in contact with the same web.
description | Web Walker | The spider ignores movement restrictions caused by webbing.

title: Calligraphy Wyrm
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 30 ft., passive Perception 12
description | Amorphous | Can fit through 1-inch spaces, has advantage on Hide checks.
description | Spider Climb | Can climb difficult surfaces at will.
description | False Appearance | While motionless, it is indistinguishable from faded art, graffiti, or other similar markings.

title: Psychometry
contents: property | Components | V, S, M (a pearl worth 150 gp)
text | You touch one object weighing no more than 25 pounds.

text | Non-magical: You can ask one of the following questions about the object: last three people to own it, place of origin, face of last user, intended purpose, age, date of last use, what it was last used for. After each question, roll DC 15 Wisdom saving throw. A failed save prevents further questions for 24 hours.

title: Biofeedback
contents: text | As an attack lands, you steel your mind. You gain Damage Resistance equal to 5 * proficiency bonus. Successful attacks against you deal up to twice the reflect damage to the attack, including against the triggering attack, until the start of your next turn.

title: Stats Reference
contents: property | Senses | darkvision 30 ft., passive Perception 11
property | Languages | Common, Draconic, Abyssal, Celestial, Thieves' Cant

title: Mage Hand
contents: text | You can use your bonus action to control the hand. It is invisible. You can use the hand to manipulate an object or container, stow or retrieve an item from an open container, pick locks, pick pockets, and plant items in held or worn containers using Sleight of Hand checks. You can move the hand up to 30 feet each time you use it.
text | The hand can't attack, activate magic items, or carry more than 10 pounds.

title: Healer's Kit
contents: text | This kit is a leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and splints. The kit has 10 uses. As an action, you can expend one use of the kit to stabilize a creature that has 0 hit points, without needing to make a Wisdom ( Medicine ) check.

title: Caltrops
contents: text | As an action, you can spread a single bag of caltrops to cover a 5-foot-square area. Any creature that enters the area must succeed on a DC 15 Dexterity saving throw or stop moving and take 1 piercing damage. Until the creature regains at least 1 hit point, its walking speed is reduced by 10 feet. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.

title: Ball Bearings
contents: text | As an action, you can spill these tiny metal balls from their pouch to cover a level area 10 feet square. A creature moving across the covered area must succeed on a DC 10 Dexterity saving throw or fall prone. A creature moving through the area at half speed doesn't need to make the saving throw.

title: Alchemist's Fire ( flask )
contents: text | This sticky, adhesive fluid ignites when exposed to air. As an action, you can throw this flask up to 20 feet, shattering it on impact. Make a ranged attack against a creature or object, treating the alchemist's fire as an improvised weapon. On a hit, the target takes 1d4 fire damage at the start of each of its turns. A creature can end this damage by using its action to make a DC 10 Dexterity check to extinguish the flames.

title: Rope + Grappling Hook
contents: text | Rope, whether made of hemp or silk, has 2 hit points and can be burst with a DC 17 Strength check.
text | Can be attached to the end of a rope allowing it to attach to surfaces and objects.
